languages.text: "Футфол — мое великое творение. С него началось победоносное шествие {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} вглубь Простора Коронус. Ты здесь, тебе удалось обнаружить послание в изданном по моему приказу альманахе Футфола, а также найти те тайники, что я приказал заложить в его избранных местах. Тебе открылся вид с купола Большого собора, таранящие пустоту арки Моста Провидения, холодный взгляд звезд сквозь окна Малой пристани. Только так, шаг за шагом, можно постичь масштаб и изящество моего творения".

"Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. You are here because you managed to discover the message in the almanac of Footfall published on my orders and find the caches I had installed at select sites. You have seen the view from the dome of the Great Cathedral, the void-piercing arches of the Providence Bridge, the stars' cold gaze through the windows of the Small Quay. Only thus, step by step, can one experience the scale and the elegance of my creation."
languages.original_text: "Футфол — мое великое творение. С него началось победоносное шествие {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} вглубь Простора Коронус. Только так, шаг за шагом, можно постичь масштаб и изящество моего творения".

traits.locale_text: "Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the Imperium's triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. You are here because you have managed to discover the message in the almanac of Footfall published on my orders and find the stashes I had installed in its select sites. You have seen the view from the dome of the Grand Cathedral, the void-piercing arches of the Providence Bridge, the stars' cold gaze through the windows of the Small Quay. Only thus, step by step, one can experience the scale and the elegance of my creation."

languages.text: 「フットフォールはワタシの偉大な創造物だ。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}がコロヌス・エクスパンスへ堂々と漕ぎ出たした歴史的瞬間の始まりを示している。キミたちがここにいるのは、ワタシの命令で発行されたフットフォールの年鑑に書かれたメッセージを発見し、ワタシが特定の場所に隠した宝を見つけることができたからだ。キミはグレート・カテドラルのドームからの景色や、プロヴィデンス・ブリッジの虚空を貫くアーチや、小さき波止場の窓から見える星々の冷たい眼差しを見てきた。ワタシの創造物の壮大さと華麗さは、そのように一歩一歩踏み出すことでしか経験できない」
languages.original_text: "Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. You are here because you managed to discover the message in the almanac of Footfall published on my orders and find the caches I had installed at select sites. You have seen the view from the dome of the Great Cathedral, the void-piercing arches of the Providence Bridge, the stars' cold gaze through the windows of the Small Quay. Only thus, step by step, can one experience the scale and the elegance of my creation."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォールはワタシの偉大な創造物だ。{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}がコロヌス・エクスパンスへ堂々と漕ぎ出たした歴史的瞬間の始まりを示している。キミたちがここにいるのは、ワタシの命令で発行されたフットフォールの年鑑に書かれたメッセージを発見し、ワタシが特定の場所に隠した宝を見つけることができたからだ。キミはグレート・カテドラルのドームからの景色や、プロヴィデンス・ブリッジの虚空を貫くアーチや、小さき波止場の窓から見える星々の冷たい眼差しを見てきた。ワタシの創造物の壮大さと華麗さは、そのように一歩一歩踏み出すことでしか経験できない」

languages.text: “落脚港是我的伟大杰作，它标志着{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}胜利进军科罗努斯扩区的伟大开端。既然你能找到这里，就说明你成功在我下令出版的落脚港年鉴中，发现了隐藏的信息，还找到了我在特定地点设置好的藏匿处。你已经亲眼参观过至高大教堂圆顶上的恢弘风光，通天桥拱洞下的深邃视野，还有小码头穿窗而过的星辰幽光。只有通过这样，一步接一步，你才能体会到我这伟大杰作的宏伟与优雅。”
languages.original_text: "Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. You are here because you managed to discover the message in the almanac of Footfall published on my orders and find the caches I had installed at select sites. You have seen the view from the dome of the Great Cathedral, the void-piercing arches of the Providence Bridge, the stars' cold gaze through the windows of the Small Quay. Only thus, step by step, can one experience the scale and the elegance of my creation."

traits.locale_text: “落脚港是我的伟大杰作，它标志着{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}胜利进军科罗努斯扩区的伟大开端。既然你能找到这里，就说明你成功在我下令出版的落脚港年鉴中，发现了隐藏的信息，还找到了我在特定地点设置好的藏匿处。你已经亲眼参观过至高大教堂圆顶上的恢弘风光，通天桥拱洞下的深邃视野，还有小码头穿窗而过的星辰幽光。只有通过这样，一步接一步，你才能体会到我这伟大杰作的宏伟与优雅。”

languages.text: «Paso es mi mayor creación. Es el principio del triunfal avance del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} por la Extensión de Koronus. Estás aquí porque has logrado descubrir el mensaje en el almanaque de Paso que ordené publicar y encontrado los alijos que hice instalar en diversos lugares. Has contemplado la vista desde la cúpula de la Gran Catedral, observado cómo perforan el vacío los arcos del Puente de la Providencia y devuelto a las estrellas su fría mirada por las ventanas del muelle pequeño. Solo así, paso a paso, se puede contemplar la magnitud y la elegancia de mi creación».
languages.original_text: "Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. You are here because you managed to discover the message in the almanac of Footfall published on my orders and find the caches I had installed at select sites. You have seen the view from the dome of the Great Cathedral, the void-piercing arches of the Providence Bridge, the stars' cold gaze through the windows of the Small Quay. Only thus, step by step, can one experience the scale and the elegance of my creation."

traits.locale_text: «Paso es mi mayor creación. Es el principio del triunfal avance del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} por la Extensión de Koronus. Estás aquí porque has logrado descubrir el mensaje en el almanaque de Paso que ordené publicar y encontrado los alijos que hice instalar en diversos lugares. Has contemplado la vista desde la cúpula de la Gran Catedral, observado cómo perforan el vacío los arcos del Puente de la Providencia y devuelto a las estrellas su fría mirada por las ventanas del muelle pequeño. Solo así, paso a paso, se puede contemplar la magnitud y la elegancia de mi creación».

languages.text: « Castel est ma grande création. Sa construction fut le premier pas de l'avancée triomphante de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} dans les Étendues de Koronus. Si vous êtes ici, c'est parce que vous avez décrypté le message dissimulé dans l'almanach de Castel publié sur mes ordres, et découvert toutes les cachettes que j'ai établies dans divers lieux. Vous avez contemplé un panorama incroyable depuis le dôme de la Grande Cathédrale, vu le Pont de la Providence aux arches vertigineuses et admiré les étoiles glaciales depuis les fenêtres du Petit quai. C'est seulement ainsi, pas à pas, que l'on peut prendre pleinement mesure de la grandeur et de l'élégance de ma création. »
languages.original_text: "Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. You are here because you managed to discover the message in the almanac of Footfall published on my orders and find the caches I had installed at select sites. You have seen the view from the dome of the Great Cathedral, the void-piercing arches of the Providence Bridge, the stars' cold gaze through the windows of the Small Quay. Only thus, step by step, can one experience the scale and the elegance of my creation."

traits.locale_text: « Castel est ma grande création. Sa construction fut le premier pas de l'avancée triomphante de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} dans les Étendues de Koronus. Si vous êtes ici, c'est parce que vous avez décrypté le message dissimulé dans l'almanach de Castel publié sur mes ordres, et découvert toutes les cachettes que j'ai établies dans divers lieux. Vous avez contemplé un panorama incroyable depuis le dôme de la Grande Cathédrale, vu le Pont de la Providence aux arches vertigineuses et admiré les étoiles glaciales depuis les fenêtres du Petit quai. C'est seulement ainsi, pas à pas, que l'on peut prendre pleinement mesure de la grandeur et de l'élégance de ma création. »

languages.text: "Footfall ist meine große Schöpfung. Es markierte den Anfang des Triumphmarsches des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} in die Koronus-Ausdehnung. Ihr seid hier, weil Ihr die Nachricht im Almanach über Footfall gefunden habt, der auf meinen Befehl hin veröffentlicht wurde, sowie die Lage, die ich an bestimmten Stellen angelegt habe. Ihr habt den Blick von der Kuppel der Großen Kathedrale genossen, die Bögen der Brücke der Vorsehung geschaut, die bis in die Leere ragen, und den kalten Blick der Sterne durch die Fenster des kleinen Kais. Nur so lässt sich Schritt für Schritt die Größe und Eleganz meiner Schöpfung erfassen."
languages.original_text: "Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. traits.locale_text: "Footfall ist meine große Schöpfung. Es markierte den Anfang des Triumphmarsches des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} in die Koronus-Ausdehnung. Ihr seid hier, weil Ihr die Nachricht im Almanach über Footfall gefunden habt, der auf meinen Befehl hin veröffentlicht wurde, sowie die Lage, die ich an bestimmten Stellen angelegt habe. Nur so lässt sich Schritt für Schritt die Größe und Eleganz meiner Schöpfung erfassen."

languages.text: "Binliman benim büyük eserimdir. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} Koronus Enginliği'ne ilerleyen zafer yürüyüşünün başlangıcını simgeler. Buradasınız zira emrimle yayınlanmış olan Binliman yıllığındaki mesajı keşfetmeyi ve belirli yerlere yerleştirdiğim zulaları bulmayı başardınız. Büyük Katedral'in kubbesindeki manzarayı, Takdiriilahi Köprüsü'nün uçsuzu delip geçen kemerlerini, Küçük Rıhtım'ın pencerelerinden görülen yıldızların soğuk bakışlarını kendi gözlerinle gördünüz. Eserimin ebatı ve zarafeti ancak bu şekilde, adım adım deneyimlenebilirdi."
languages.original_text: "Footfall is my great creation. It is what marked the beginning of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}'s triumphant march into the Koronus Expanse. You are here because you managed to discover the message in the almanac of Footfall published on my orders and find the caches I had installed at select sites. You have seen the view from the dome of the Great Cathedral, the void-piercing arches of the Providence Bridge, the stars' cold gaze through the windows of the Small Quay. Only thus, step by step, can one experience the scale and the elegance of my creation."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman benim en görkemli yaratımımdır. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un Koronus Enginliği'ni hedef alan başarılı seferinin başlangıcını sembolize eder. Burada olma sebebin, emrimle yayınlanmış olan Binliman almanağındaki mesajı keşfetmeyi ve seçilmiş bölgelere yerleştirdiğim sandıkları bulmayı başarmış olman. Büyük Katedral'in kubbesindeki manzarayı, Takdiriilahi Köprüsü'ndeki uçsuzu delip geçen kemerleri, Küçük Rıhtım'ın pencerelerinden görülen yıldızların soğuk bakışlarını kendi gözlerinle gördün. Kişi, yaratımımın büyüklüğünü ve zarafetini ancak bu şekilde, adım adım deneyimleyebilir."
